question: Posted By Wanda on May 03, 1998 at 20:28:02:The state I live in will require the Hepatitis B vaccine for my children bythe year 2000.  I have heard of an unusual complication that lay-people areattributing to the vaccine, and I'd like to know if this complication has beenreported to any medical personnel.There has been a connection in two cases in the Puget Sound area of children,one age five years, the other sixteen, that have developed juvenile diabeteswithin three months of receiving the vaccine.  Both children do not have afamily history of juvenile diabetes.My question, then, is whether or not any of the ingredients or virusescontained in the virus could be responsible for this development, or is itjust an idiopathic occurrence in these two children?
title: Hepatitis B Vaccine Complications
